content: लावणिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [लवणे संस्कृतं ठण्] {@--1@} Salted, dressed with salt. {@--2@} Dealing in salt. {@--3@} Lovely, beautiful, charming; लीलयैव सुतनोस्तुलयित्वा गौरवाढ्यमपि लावणिकेन <ls>Śi. 10. 38</ls> (where it means ‘a saltmerchant’ also). --कः A salt-merchant. --कं A salt-vessel, salt-cellar.
